(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This))
    (VP (VBZ is)
      (NP
        (NP (DT the) (NN story))
        (PP (IN of)
          (NP (NNP Easter))))
      (SBAR (IN as)
        (S
          (VP (VBD told)
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP
                (NP (DT the) (NN book))
                (PP (IN of)
                  (NP (NNP Matthew)))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(story-4, This-1)
cop(story-4, is-2)
det(story-4, the-3)
root(ROOT-0, story-4)
prep(story-4, of-5)
pobj(of-5, Easter-6)
mark(told-8, as-7)
advcl(story-4, told-8)
prep(told-8, in-9)
det(book-11, the-10)
pobj(in-9, book-11)
prep(book-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, Matthew-13)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Listen)
      (PRT (RP out))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (DT the) (NNS voices))
          (PP (IN of)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Angela) (NNP Bassett))
              (CC and)
              (NP (NNP Blair) (NNP Underwood)))))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, Listen-1)
prt(Listen-1, out-2)
prep(Listen-1, for-3)
det(voices-5, the-4)
pobj(for-3, voices-5)
prep(voices-5, of-6)
nn(Bassett-8, Angela-7)
pobj(of-6, Bassett-8)
cc(Bassett-8, and-9)
nn(Underwood-11, Blair-10)
conj(Bassett-8, Underwood-11)


(ROOT
  (INTJ (UH Incidentally) (UH ,)))


root(ROOT-0, Incidentally-1)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB hear)
        (NP (PRP him))
        (PP (IN in)
          (NP (DT this) (NN clip)))))
    (, ,)))


nsubj(hear-4, you-1)
aux(hear-4, do-2)
neg(hear-4, n't-3)
root(ROOT-0, hear-4)
dobj(hear-4, him-5)
prep(hear-4, in-6)
det(clip-8, this-7)
pobj(in-6, clip-8)


(ROOT
  (S (CC but)
    (NP (PRP they))
    (VP (VBD got)
      (S
        (NP (NNP Samuel) (NNP L) (NNP Jackson))
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB do)
            (NP
              (NP (DT the) (NN voice))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NNP God))))))))
    (. !)))


cc(got-3, but-1)
nsubj(got-3, they-2)
root(ROOT-0, got-3)
nn(Jackson-6, Samuel-4)
nn(Jackson-6, L-5)

aux(do-8, to-7)
xcomp(got-3, do-8)
det(voice-10, the-9)
dobj(do-8, voice-10)
prep(voice-10, of-11)
pobj(of-11, God-12)

    (SBAR (IN that)
      (S

(ROOT

    (S

(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB how))
    (SQ (MD can)
      (NP (NNS Christians))
      (VP (VB be)
        (ADJP (RB so) (JJ sure))
        (SBAR (IN that)
          (S
            (NP (NNP Jesus))
            (VP (VBD rose)
              (PP (IN from)
                (NP (DT the) (NN dead))))))))
    (. ?)))


advmod(sure-6, how-1)
aux(sure-6, can-2)
nsubj(sure-6, Christians-3)
cop(sure-6, be-4)
advmod(sure-6, so-5)
root(ROOT-0, sure-6)
mark(rose-9, that-7)
nsubj(rose-9, Jesus-8)
ccomp(sure-6, rose-9)
prep(rose-9, from-10)
det(dead-12, the-11)
pobj(from-10, dead-12)


(ROOT
  (S (RB Then)
    (NP (PRP you))
    (VP (VBP are)
      (ADVP (RB just))
      (NP (DT the) (JJ right) (NN person)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB come)
              (VP (VB attend)
                (NP
                  (NP (DT the) (NNP Alpha) (NN course))
                  (SBAR
                    (WHNP (WDT which))
                    (S
                      (VP (VBZ is)
                        (VP (VBG starting)
                          (NP (DT this) (NN week)))))))))))))
    (. !)))


advmod(person-7, Then-1)
nsubj(person-7, you-2)
cop(person-7, are-3)
advmod(person-7, just-4)
det(person-7, the-5)
amod(person-7, right-6)
root(ROOT-0, person-7)
aux(come-9, to-8)
infmod(person-7, come-9)
xcomp(come-9, attend-10)
det(course-13, the-11)
nn(course-13, Alpha-12)
dobj(attend-10, course-13)
nsubj(starting-16, which-14)
aux(starting-16, is-15)
rcmod(course-13, starting-16)
det(week-18, this-17)
tmod(starting-16, week-18)


(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT The) (NNP Alpha) (NN course))
    (VP (VBZ provides)
      (NP (DT the) (NN opportunity))
      (PP (TO to)
        (PP (IN for)
          (NP
            (NP (DT these) (NNS questions))
            (CC and)
            (NP (JJ other) (NNS questions)))))
      (S
        (VP (TO to)
          (VP (VB be)
            (VP (VBN asked)
              (PP (IN in)
                (NP (DT a) (JJ relaxed)
                  (CC and)
                  (JJ non-threatening) (NN environment))))))))
    (. .)))


det(course-3, The-1)
nn(course-3, Alpha-2)
nsubj(provides-4, course-3)
root(ROOT-0, provides-4)
det(opportunity-6, the-5)
dobj(provides-4, opportunity-6)
prep(provides-4, to-7)
pcomp(to-7, for-8)
det(questions-10, these-9)
pobj(for-8, questions-10)
cc(questions-10, and-11)
amod(questions-13, other-12)
conj(questions-10, questions-13)
aux(asked-16, to-14)
auxpass(asked-16, be-15)
xcomp(provides-4, asked-16)
prep(asked-16, in-17)
det(environment-22, a-18)
amod(environment-22, relaxed-19)
cc(relaxed-19, and-20)
conj(relaxed-19, non-threatening-21)
pobj(in-17, environment-22)


(ROOT
  (SINV
    (ADVP (RB Here))
    (VP (VBP are))
    (NP
      (NP (DT some) (JJ other) (NNS questions))
      (VP
        (ADVP (RB often))
        (VBN asked)
        (PP (IN during)
          (NP (DT an) (NNP Alpha) (NN course)))))
    (: :)))


advmod(are-2, Here-1)
root(ROOT-0, are-2)
det(questions-5, some-3)
amod(questions-5, other-4)
nsubj(are-2, questions-5)
advmod(asked-7, often-6)
partmod(questions-5, asked-7)
prep(asked-7, during-8)
det(course-11, an-9)
nn(course-11, Alpha-10)
pobj(during-8, course-11)

(ROOT
  (SBARQ
    (WHADVP (WRB How))
    (SQ (VBZ does)
      (NP (DT a) (`` ``) (JJ good) ('' '') (NN God))
      (VP (VB allow)
        (ADVP (RB so) (RB much))
        (S
          (VP (VBG suffering)
            (PP (IN in)
              (NP (DT the) (NN world)))))))
    (. ?)))

(ROOT
  (FRAG
    (ADVP (RB So))
    (SBAR (IN if)
      (S
        (NP (PRP you))
        (VP (VBP have)
          (ADVP (RB always))
          (VP (VBN been)
            (VP (VBG wanting)
              (S
                (VP (TO to)
                  (VP (VB join)
                    (NP
                      (NP (DT a) (NN group))
                      (PP (IN of)
                        (NP
                          (NP (NNS people))
                          (SBAR
                            (WHNP (WP who))
                            (S
                              (VP (VBP are)
                                (ADVP (RB also))
                                (VP (VBG asking)
                                  (NP (JJ similar) (NNS questions)))))))))
                    (, ,)))))))))))


root(ROOT-0, So-1)
mark(wanting-7, if-2)
nsubj(wanting-7, you-3)
aux(wanting-7, have-4)
advmod(wanting-7, always-5)
aux(wanting-7, been-6)
dep(So-1, wanting-7)
aux(join-9, to-8)
xcomp(wanting-7, join-9)
det(group-11, a-10)
dobj(join-9, group-11)
prep(group-11, of-12)
pobj(of-12, people-13)
nsubj(asking-17, who-14)
aux(asking-17, are-15)
advmod(asking-17, also-16)
rcmod(people-13, asking-17)
amod(questions-19, similar-18)
dobj(asking-17, questions-19)


(ROOT
  (S
    (VP
      (VP (VB do)
        (NP (NN sign))
        (PRT (RP up)))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB come)
        (PRT (RP along))
        (NP (DT this) (NNP Friday) (NN evening))))
    (. .)))


root(ROOT-0, do-1)
dobj(do-1, sign-2)
prt(do-1, up-3)
cc(do-1, and-4)
conj(do-1, come-5)
prt(come-5, along-6)
det(evening-9, this-7)
nn(evening-9, Friday-8)
tmod(come-5, evening-9)

  (S

    (VP (MD can)

(ROOT
  (S
    (VP (VB Click)
      (ADVP (RB here))
      (PP (IN for)
        (NP
          (NP (JJR more) (NNS details))
          (PP (IN about)
            (NP (NNP Alpha))))))))


root(ROOT-0, Click-1)

prep(Click-1, for-3)
amod(details-5, more-4)
pobj(for-3, details-5)
prep(details-5, about-6)
pobj(about-6, Alpha-7)
